verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father we love You, we worship and adore You.
Glorify Thy name in all the earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glorify Thy name, glorify Thy name.
Glorify Thy name in all the earth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Padre te amo, te adoro y te alabo.
En Tu nombre glorificate.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Glorificate, glorificate.
En Tu nombre glorificate.
